00073   Signal* retrieveSignal() {
00074     Signal* tmp = signal;
00075     signal = NULL;
00076     return tmp;
00077   }

00092     static cObject* setControlInfo(cMessage *const pMsg, Signal *const pSignal) {
00093       MacToPhyControlInfo *const cCtrlInfo = new MacToPhyControlInfo(pSignal);
00094       pMsg->setControlInfo(cCtrlInfo);
00095 
00096       return cCtrlInfo;
00097     }
00101     static Signal* getSignal(cMessage *const pMsg) {
00102       return getSignalFromControlInfo(pMsg->getControlInfo());
00103     }
00107     static Signal* getSignalFromControlInfo(cObject *const pCtrlInfo) {
00108       MacToPhyControlInfo *const cCtrlInfo = dynamic_cast<MacToPhyControlInfo *const>(pCtrlInfo);
00109 
00110       if (cCtrlInfo)
00111         return cCtrlInfo->retrieveSignal();
00112       return NULL;
00113     }
